text: Kahi railway station () is located in Kahi,The engine of a pilot wagon was partially damaged and three bogies were derailed when the wagon hit an anti- tank mine planted near Kahi railway station, Kohat. Frontier Post, 13 Feb Khyber Pakhtunkhwa,Pakistan's abandoned North Western Railway stations echo a forgotten past Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Hangu District, Pakistan
title: Kahi railway station
